title: Honoring the Memory of Charlie Kirk
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation (10969) issued on September 10, 2025, honoring the memory of Charles Kirk. It orders the U.S. flag to be flown at half-staff at various federal buildings, military posts, and U.S. embassies abroad until sunset on September 14, 2025. The proclamation is published in the Federal Register, Vol. 90, No. 176, on Monday, September 15, 2025.
